instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: De crisis van de nationale politiek heeft consequenties die ver voorbij de grenzen van afzonderlijke landen reiken.
output: A crise da política nacional tem consequências que ecoam muito além das fronteiras dos países individuais.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Dat leidde tot de volgende stap: Buitenlandse bedrijven die in China willen investeren, mochten gebruik maken van deze deposito's door obligaties in yuan uit te geven, en uitverkoren buitenlandse financiële instellingen mochten yuan beleggen op de Chinese markt voor interbancaire obligaties.
output: Isso levou ao próximo passo: as firmas estrangeiras que queriam investir na China foram autorizadas a dispor desses depósitos através da emissão de títulos denominados em renminbi, e foi permitido a determinadas instituições financeiras offshore que investissem fundos em renminbi no mercado interbancário de títulos na China.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: De weg die we hebben besloten te zullen volgen zal snel handelen mogelijk maken.
output: O caminho que decidimos tomar permitirá uma acção rápida.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Dat zal niet makkelijk zijn; in feite kan het een onmogelijke opdracht blijken.
output: Isso não será fácil; de facto, poderá ser equivalente a tentar resolver a quadratura do círculo.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Geconfronteerd met anti-monarchistische, revolutionaire agitatie gaf het parlement in 1643 – zoals Cameron zich zou moeten herinneren – zijn goedkeuring aan de Licensing Order, die de Britse pers censuur vóór publicatie oplegde.
output: Perante o fervor revolucionário anti-monárquico, o Parlamento - e Cameron deveria recordar-se disso - aprovou o Regulamento de 1643, que impôs a censura antes da publicação das notícias na imprensa britânica.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Als het bewijsmateriaal zo duidelijk is als in het geval van vaccins – en de consequenties zo ernstig – heeft de overheid de bevoegdheid – zo niet de verplichting – te handelen uit naam van de openbare veiligheid.
output: Quando as provas são tão evidentes como é o caso relativamente às vacinas (e quando as consequências são tão graves), o governo tem autoridade reconhecida (e mesmo obrigação) para tomar medidas em nome da segurança pública.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Zo moet het ook zijn.
output: É assim que deve ser.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Nog een andere schadelijke mythe, die in leven wordt gehouden door shockerende beelden van vluchtelingen die door gaten in grenshekken stromen of in Calais proberen aan boord van een trein te klimmen, is dat “Fort Europa” wordt belaagd door de een na de andere golf barbaren.
output: Outro mito prejudicial, imortalizado por imagens chocantes de multidões de refugiados que atravessam as vedações das fronteiras e tentam entrar em comboios em Calais, é o de que a “Fortaleza Europa” está sob o ataque de vagas de bárbaros.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Bijna twee miljoen vluchtelingen uit Syrië zijn naar Turkije gegaan, en één miljoen naar Libanon, een land met een bevolking van slechts 3,5 miljoen zielen.
output: Cerca de dois milhões de refugiados oriundos da Síria fugiram para a Turquia, e um milhão fugiu para o Líbano, que tem apenas 3,5 milhões de habitantes.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Een Europese Unie zonder euro?
output: Uma União Sem Euro?

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: En wat zou de overheid moeten doen?
output: O que deveria fazer o governo?

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Een derde risico is dat toekomstige schuldsaneringen moeilijker te verwezenlijken zullen zijn.
output: Um terceiro risco consiste no facto de que será mais difícil alcançar acordo em futuras renegociações da dívida.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Om al deze nationale bijdragen te verbinden heeft de NAVO een technologisch geavanceerd command-and-control systeem ontwikkeld (en is het aan het uitbreiden), gestationeerd op de vliegbasis Ramstein in Duitsland.
output: Para ligar todos estes recursos nacionais, a OTAN desenvolveu, e está a expandir, um sistema tecnologicamente avançado de comando e controlo, instalado na Base Aérea de Ramstein, na Alemanha.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Bovendien beginnen het Haïtiaanse ministerie van Gezondheidszorg en de Pan-Amerikaanse Gezondheidsorganisatie/Wereldgezondheidsorganisatie de tweede fase van een door de VN gefinancierd inentingsinitiatief dat is gericht op 600.000 mensen in gebieden met cholera; 200.000 mensen zullen binnen een paar maanden worden ingeënt, terwijl nog eens 300.000 mensen aan het eind van dit jaar zullen volgen.
output: Além disso, o Ministério da Saúde haitiano e a Organização Panamericana da Saúde/Organização Mundial da Saúde estão a iniciar a segunda fase de uma iniciativa de vacinação, financiada pelas Nações Unidas, dirigida a 600 mil pessoas que vivem áreas onde as situações de cólera persistem; 200.000 pessoas serão sujeitas a vacinação nos próximos dois meses, seguindo-se mais 300.000 até o final deste ano.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Onder de doelen die ze ‘essentieel’ of ‘erg belangrijk’ vonden noemde 51% ‘het vergroten van mijn kennis over andere landen en culturen’, 46,5% ‘het ontwikkelen van een betekenisvolle levensfilosofie’ en substantiële getallen noemden doelen als ‘leider van de gemeenschap worden’, ‘het dichter bij elkaar brengen van etnische groepen’ en ‘het betrokken raken bij programma’s om het milieu te verbeteren’.
output: Entre os objectivos que consideraram “essenciais” ou “muito importantes”, 51% mencionaram “melhorar o meu entendimento de outros países e culturas”, 45,6% citaram “desenvolver uma filosofia significativa de vida”, e fracções substanciais apontaram objectivos como “tornar-se um líder da comunidade”, “ajudar a promover o entendimento racial”, e “envolver-se em programas para limpar o ambiente”.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: En dat is de reden dat zo veel economen en marktdeelnemers geshockeerd waren door de schijnbare gemakzucht van Yellen.
output: E é por isso que muitos economistas e participantes do mercado ficaram chocados com a aparente complacência de Yellen.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Net als in Nigeria zal opschorting van de vaccinaties zeer schadelijk zijn voor de buurlanden.
output: Como na Nigéria, os atrasos na vacinação seriam altamente desfavoráveis para os países vizinhos.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: De door ideologische motieven ingegeven ontkenning van de door de mensheid teweeggebrachte opwarming van de aarde staat de pogingen in de weg om de klimaat-beïnvloedende uitstoot van broeikasgassen tegen te gaan of ons voor te bereiden op de steeds duidelijker – en gevaarlijker – gevolgen van deze enorme dreiging.
output: A negação com base na ideologia do aquecimento global induzido pelo homem está a impedir os esforços de mitigação das emissões com efeito de alteração climática ou de preparação para enfrentar as consequências cada vez mais evidentes (e perigosas) desta enorme ameaça.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Maar angst is een slechte raadgever en zal niet het soort nationale consensus doen ontstaan dat Griekenland nodig heeft om vooruit te komen.
output: O medo não é a mais nobre das emoções, e não dará ascensão ao tipo de consenso nacional que a Grécia precisa para seguir em frente.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Gelukkig komen er steeds meer vaccins beschikbaar.
output: As vacinas, felizmente, estão se tornando cada vez mais disponíveis.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Als deze maatregelen effect sorteren, zullen zich waarschijnlijk zelfvoorzienende satellietsteden ontwikkelen, die de met het transport samenhangende energieconsumptie verder zullen terugdringen, terwijl ze een actievere burgermaatschappij bevorderen.
output: À medida que estas medidas produzem efeitos, as cidades satélites auto-suficientes irão provavelmente evoluir, reduzindo mais o consumo de energia relacionado com os transportes, enquanto promovem uma sociedade civil mais activa.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Het mestgebruik in Afrika bedraagt slechts 13 kilogram per hectare, vergeleken met 90 kilogram in Zuid-Azië en 190 kilogram in Oost-Azië.
output: A utilização de adubo em África chega apenas aos 13 quilogramas por hectare, comparados com 90 quilogramas na Ásia Meridional e 190 quilogramas na Ásia Oriental.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: De afkeuring door het Franse electoraat is een van de weinige dingen die Hollande en Sarkozy (twee mannen met een opmerkelijk verschillende persoonlijkheid en aanpak) gemeenschappelijk hebben.
output: A reprovação do eleitorado francês está entre as únicas coisas que Hollande e Sarkozy – dois homens com personalidades e abordagens muito diferentes – têm em comum.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: WASHINGTON, DC – Ook als Ariel Sharon nooit de politiek was ingegaan, zou hij nog steeds bekend staan als militair commandant en tacticus.
output: WASHINGTON, DC – Se Ariel Sharon nunca tivesse entrado na política, seria mesmo assim mundialmente famoso como comandante e táctico militar.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Daarvan zal grofweg een kwart sterven aan met hepB samenhangende leverkanker of cirrose (een gevolg van chronische leveraandoeningen).
output: Destes, cerca de um quarto morrerá de cancro do fígado relacionado com a transmissão do vírus VHB ou com a cirrose (consequência da doença crónica do fígado).

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Echter, om land- en hukou hervormingen te implementeren moet China’s fiscale systeem op de schop.
output: Contudo, para implementar as reformas fundiárias e do hukou, o sistema fiscal Chinês deverá ser reformulado.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Wat er gebeurt, is tegelijkertijd krachtig en helder.
output: O que está a acontecer é ao mesmo tempo poderoso e evidente.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: India, dat de afgelopen twee jaar poliovrij is geweest, is zich er terdege van bewust dat aanhoudend succes in de strijd tegen polio afhankelijk is van de uitroeiingsinspanningen elders.
output: A Índia, livre de poliomielite nos últimos 2 anos, está bem ciente que um sucesso interno duradouro depende dos esforços de erradicação noutras paragens.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Maar zowel in Amerika als elders is er een teruggang in zekerheid te onderscheiden.
output: Mas na América e noutros lugares, tem havido um decréscimo marcado da segurança.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Nomadische stammen bewegen zich vrijelijk heen en weer over de lange, poreuze Afghaans-Pakistaanse grens.
output: Populações nómadas deslocam-se livremente de um lado para o outro ao longo da vasta e porosa fronteira Afegã-Paquistanesa.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in Dutch language into Portuguese language. Translate the input statement into the output language  while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Toen hij werd gepasseerd voor promotie tot stafchef en zich uit actieve dienst had teruggetrokken (hij zou zijn epische veldslag in 1973 als reservist voeren) waarschuwde een wijze Israëlische generaal zijn collega's dat hij zou terugkomen als minister van Defensie, en dat hij, als hij dat ministerie zou verliezen – wat inderdaad gebeurde na de oorlog in Libanon van 1982 – zou terugkeren als premier.
output: Quando foi preterido na promoção para Chefe do Estado-Maior do Exército e se retirou do serviço activo (travaria a sua batalha épica de 1973 como reservista), um sábio general Israelita avisou os seus colegas que ele voltaria como Ministro da Defesa, e se ele perdesse esse cargo – como lhe aconteceu depois da Guerra do Líbano de 1982 – ele voltaria como Primeiro-Ministro.
